game.name: Chant Wizard
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Achievements, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Scream to win! Shout over-the-top spells in this hilarious voice-controlled battler. Assemble your magical deck from the five elements for 1v1 duels testing your wits and shame. Warning: Play safely—don't let your roaring summon the neighbors before you beat your rival!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Scream to win! Shout over-the-top spells in this hilarious voice-controlled battler. Assemble your magical deck from the five elements for 1v1 duels testing your wits and shame. Warning: Play safely—don't let your roaring summon the neighbors before you beat your rival!
